name: GET OUT!
description:
Welcome to London, 1953.

The Cold War is in full swing.
You're a lone operative in dangerous territory.

Can you uncover and complete the challenges awaiting you?

A point-and-click escape room with secrets and consequences. Comes with mysterious toilet jokes and historically accurate propaganda.



Features:

• 8 timeless puzzles to beat
• An ending to die for
• Atmospheric original art and soundtrack
